Text:
It extracted for me. HOWEVER, there was a big audio glitch between 15:30 and 31:00 - that's 15 minutes - where it used audio from the beginning of the show.  What was there did not seem terribly important, and the audio fixes itself before the voting closed.

tl;dr: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS.  Get one of the others instead.
the others go out of sync too
the others go out of sync too the whole ep is unwatchable stays out of sync through out til over "(
Repacks of all versions of this episode have been posted, fixing the audio screwup.  Looks like they all work off one source?
